Package controller

Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApplicantController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewProjectInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficerController
public class ApplicantController extends Object implements ViewProjectInterface
Controller class for managing applicant operations in the BTO application system. This class handles viewing projects, checking application status, and submitting applications. It implements the ViewProjectInterface to provide standard project viewing capabilities.

  • Method Details

    • checkApplicationStatus

      public void checkApplicationStatus(User user)
      Displays the status of all applications submitted by the user. If an application has BOOKED status, offers the user an option to view the booking receipt.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose application status to check

    • getApplicantById

      public Applicant getApplicantById(String applicantID)
      Retrieves an applicant by their ID from the repository.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - The ID of the applicant to retrieve
      Returns:
      The found Applicant object or null if not found

    • listProject

      public List<Project> listProject(Applicant applicant, String neighbourhoodFilter, FlatType flatTypeFilter)
      Lists all available projects based on filtering criteria. Projects are filtered by: - Future closing dates - Project visibility - Specified neighborhood (if provided) - Specified flat type (if provided) - Projects not handled by the applicant (if they are also an officer)
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant for whom to list projects
      neighbourhoodFilter - The neighborhood to filter by (null for no filter)
      flatTypeFilter - The flat type to filter by (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      List of projects matching the filtering criteria

    • isApplyProject

      public boolean isApplyProject(Project project, User user)
      Checks if a user has already applied for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check
      user - The user to check applications for
      Returns:
      true if the user has applied for the project, false otherwise

    • viewProject

      public void viewProject(User user)
      Allows an applicant to view available projects with filtering options. Implements eligibility checks based on marital status and age. Single applicants must be at least 35 years old. Married applicants must be at least 21 years old. Single applicants can only view 2-room flats.
      Specified by:
      viewProject in interface ViewProjectInterface
      Parameters:
      user - The user viewing projects

    • submitApplication

      public void submitApplication(User user)
      Handles the submission of BTO applications. Enforces eligibility rules: - Single applicants must be at least 35 years old and can only apply for 2-room flats. - Married applicants must be at least 21 years old and can apply for 2-room or 3-room flats. Allows filtering and selecting of projects before submission.
      Parameters:
      user - The user submitting the application
